TEXT.TITLE: GENERAL SIGNAL <GSX> LOW BIDDER ON RADIO JOB
TEXT.BODY: General Signal Corp said its General Railway Signal Co unit is the apparent low bidder at 32.5 mln dlrs on a transit radio system contract for the Southern California Rapid Transit District in Los Angeles. The company also said its General Farebox Inc subsidiary received a 3.1 mln dlr farebox system contract from the Greater Cleveland Regional Transit Authority. Reuter
